p: The list of top SNPs within each ML analysis was tested for enrichment in the list of genes expressed in microglia (n = 761)71, astrocytes (n = 757)72, and synapses (n = 1535)73, with a window size of 35 kilobase (kb) upstream and 10 kb downstream of regions to include regulatory elements. To account for non-independent SNPs in the genomic regions, enrichment p-values were derived using a bootstrap approach (Supplementary section 1.8) and presented without correction for multiple testing for the number of cell types tested.
